abstract.para: An overview of how to use the couchdb-maven-plugin

section.title: Developing Couch Applications
section.para:
With this done, you can then declare projects with a packaging of couchapp:
Defining a couchapp project <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"> <groupId>my.group.id</groupId> <artifactId>some-couch-project</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> <packaging>couchapp</packaging> // rest of project </project>
